column5: Boys and Girls,  I was sent a email promising a FREE 45th Year Hoodie with every purchase over $195....  http://www.rangerwear.com/Black-Hoodie-with-45th-Anniversary-Applique-P376.aspx?utm_source=Retail+Email&utm_medium=Text&utm_campaign=December+2012  http://www.rangerwear.com/?utm_source=Retail+Email&utm_medium=Text&utm_campaign=December+2012
Why would you want one of those? It doesn't say "TUNDRA" on it, so it's not worth it.

I agree.........as a matter of fact, Toyota sent me and my son FREE hats and tee shirts...both long and short sleeve tee shirts...  But I thought I would pass it along for those Ranger Lovers.....BTW if I ever got a bassy boat, it would be a Ranger.
